name: No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose, Vanilla Flower..Fragrance Description:No.14 Icila, a warm floral fragrance opens with top notes of ruby pamplemousse, Mandarin leaf, and jasmine. At its heart are dark plum, vanilla, and Sakura blossoms. A base of warm, sultry woods and sweet floral blossoms leave a shimmering effect, reminding you there is no better moment than now..About the Fragrance:Inspired by the French word ici, meaning here, this intoxicating scent demonstrates that every fleeting second is sacred. Icila reminds us of the gift of time that should never be taken for granted..Clean & Planet Aware:Our ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Parfum/Fragrance, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Geraniol, Coumarin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Citronellol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_title: Your Fragrance IQ Just Got Higher!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a long-time fragrance lover and collector, who is constantly accumulating more and more fragrances, I know exactly what I want in a perfume. I have very high standards and when I get a new fragrance, it HAS to meet them in order to stay in my collection!  This was my first time trying a scent from Maison Louis Marie and I was BEYOND impressed by Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum!!! What I love the most about it is its versatility! It is a fragrance that can be worn day or night, all year round, and for any occasion! Whether I'm heading out to a formal dinner or just running errands, this perfume consistently makes me feel elegant, sophisticated and well put-together. It starts off as fresh and invigorating, giving off a citrusy floral blend from the notes of mandarin leaf, jasmine and ruby pamplemousse. It then begins to warm up into a deep, sexy, dark plum scent with delicate notes of sweet vanilla flower before ultimately drying down into a perfect balance between warm woods and fresh floral blossoms. The longevity of the scent is also impressive, as I can still catch whiffs of it on my skin HOURS after applying it. Not to mention the compliments I receive ALL day long - from 5 minutes after I've applied it to 5 hours!   The packaging of the fragrance is also worth mentioning. The sleek and minimalistic design of the bottle is both chic and underrated, making it the perfect addition to any vanity or perfume collection. A beautiful bottle with no frill labeling, snuggly set in a gorgeous matte off-white box. The sprayer dispenses just the right amount of product, ensuring that you can apply it with precision and control. The Maison Louis Marie brand prides itself on using only the finest natural and sustainable materials/ingredients, and it truly shows in the craftsmanship of this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like to think of myself as a beauty and skincare enthusiast and most recently a fragrance collector as well. I love that feeling of picking a new perfume everyday to suit my mood, the occasion, the season, etc. I also love mixing and layering scents to make them very personal to you.  The Maison Louis Marie No. 14- Icila is one of the scents that I can best describe as warm, sophisticated, sweet, yet spicy at the same time. It is such a wonderful mix of notes that balance each other so well. At first spritz I do get a bit of the more floral jasmin notes, that intertwine with some of the sweet bulgarian rose and dark plum, and then finally the dry down is that very spicy vanilla flower with the citrus of the mandarin leaf, but also the sweetness of the sakura blossom. Even with all those wonderful notes lingering, it is a subtle scent, not overpowering at all and can be worn daily, I would definitely recommend this on a hot summer night in the city enjoying date night or girls night out. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is what carrying a designer handbag must feel like - chic, sophisticated, sexy, and maybe even a little mysterious. Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila is a timeless perfume that commands attention without being overpowering. reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is a feminine warm floral fragrance that screams elegance. I love the sleek minimalistic bottle and packaging. No. 14 Icila opens with a burst of citrus, accompanied by a vanilla base. However, the citrus element is very short lived and gives way to a bouquet of floral notes: rose and jasmine. As the perfume dries down, the vanilla note grows stronger.  It is a warm and creamy scent, while maintaining its sweet floral essence throughout. Strangely enough, the dark plum note isn‚Äôt quite detectable to me when I spray it on my skin, something about my skin chemistry, but it is noticeable when I spray it on clothing. The projection of this perfume is impressive‚Äîothers can easily smell it on me. However, its lasting power leaves something to be desired. I only get four hours of wear.  Maison Louis Marie is a clean fragrance house you will feel good supporting. They are a One Percent for the Planet member and dedicate 1% of their revenue to the National Forest Foundation.  On my skin, this perfume smells better when the sun is out and the temps are warmer. There is something about this scent that makes me think of the Netflix series, Bridgerton, when I wear this. While No. 14 Icila may not have the longest lasting power, it is a beautiful scent that I recommend anyone who enjoys sweet florals, warm vanilla scents to try.    *This review was collected as part of a promotion.

The two citrusy top notes help reduce stress, while the mid and base notes melt into a warm, sultry floral scent. Usually scents that are in the spicy, woodsy family make me sneeze profusely. Applying three spritzes (one on each side of my neck and 1 rubbed between my inner wrists) of Maison Louis Marie No. 14 - Icila on clean skin leaves me smelling wealthy all day! Unlike other French-based fragrances, Icila does a phenomenal job of embodying the French culture in a bottle. I strongly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a bold, long-lasting fragrance that balances sultry with sophistication and spicy with fresh. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: As a connoisseur of fine fragrances, I've had the pleasure of encountering many scents that transport me to different realms of emotion and imagination. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the brands' incredible history, to the family history of French botany, it's a story that twists and turns from the French Revolution to being exiled to Madagascar and all the incredible Botanical gardens etc of 200 years ago, to its founder Marie du Petit Thouars and her love of the Botanical history of her family. She has created from scent memories of her childhood and family gardens, luxury perfumes candles, and skincare. The husband and wife duo behind Maison Louis Marie are committed to clean beauty, and making amazing perfumes without all the harsh and toxic chemicals -for people or the environment- and they don't test on animals or use any animal byproducts. The company is climate-neutral certified, gives 1% back to the planet on every sale they make, and are part of the National Forrest Foundation. This is a truly clean brand that I am proud to support. Plus how cool is it that their brand mark is an original drawing by Louise Marie of an orchid discovery of his? I love it when Family history is such a big part of a brand. This new intriguing scent is called No. 14- Icila. It's got top notes of jasmine, Mandarin leaf, and ruby Pamplemousse. Followed by mid notes of rose, osmanthus, and dark plum with a base of Vanilla flower, Sakura blossom, and patchouli. The base of vanilla flower is important, it is very noticeable, So if you're not a fan of vanilla, this is probably not a scent for you. The next two scents I can smell the strongest are the Bulgarian rose and dark plum. I must say, Marie has such an incredible nose, and I appreciate her sharing it with the world. This is a perfume that when sprayed on your pulse points, like your wrist and your neck, when you walk into a room people in the back will take notice. I can almost guarantee that they will want to know what you're wearing and where they can get it. Every time I smell No. 14 I get something new from it. The key notes are jasmine, Bulgarian rose, and vanilla with pamplemousse, mandarin leaf, dark plum and patchouli it‚Äôs such a beautiful union of warm florals. The scent is perfect for spring and summer and I can picture myself wearing it to a picnic or a brunch date. It‚Äôs a very cheerful happy fragrance that‚Äôs super elegant and extremely long lasting. I can also picture this being worn in colder months as well. It‚Äôs a very versatile scent.   I can do one spray and it‚Äôs lasted up to six hours and it‚Äôs truly one of the most long lasting fragrances I‚Äôve tried and it packs an incredible punch since it goes such a long way. I love the values of Maison Louis Marie and the sustainable ingredients used in their scents since I live a cruelty free lifestyle. The packaging is also so sleek and stunning. I love the simple and sophisticated bottle.

Overall, one of the best and luxurios fragrance available in the market today and I highly recommend it to everyone to give it a try. reviews.review_title: A perfect addition to my perfume collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Brianna and I am a certified perfume addict. I currently own over 100 perfumes and body mists. I love smelling like something different everyday. Wearing perfume truly speaks to my soul and is truly my place of comfort every time I press the nozzle of a bottle.  As someone who loves a good, strong fragrance, I was very surprised at how much I loved the bright and airiness of the Maison Louis Marie's No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum, it felt like a breath of fresh air ‚Äì quite literally.  From the moment I uncapped the bottle, I was enveloped in a delicate floral bouquet that instantly captivated my senses. The blend of jasmine, ruby pamplemousse, dark plum, vanilla flower, and patchouli created a sweet, yet subtly intoxicating aroma that reminded me of the iconic Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb, but with a less sweet and intimate touch.  What struck me most about No. 14 Icila was its ability to strike the perfect balance between presence and subtlety. With just 1-2 sprays, the fragrance transformed into a delightful skin scent, lingering closely and only detectable by those in my immediate vicinity.   However, when I felt like making a bolder statement, 4-6 sprays created an enchanting scent bubble that extended to arm's length. As the fragrance interacted with my body chemistry, it unfolded in a captivating way, leaving those around me intrigued about the scent I was wearing.  What truly resonated with me about Maison Louis Marie was their commitment to sustainability and minimizing their carbon footprint. As someone who values eco-friendly practices, knowing that No. 14 Icila was a clean and sustainable fragrance made me feel even more connected to the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The experience with Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icilia has been delightful. The presentation for the perfume is luxury from start to finish. The box may be minimal but its enough for a clean look and the bottle is the same with a less is more stance. With that being said less is more is surely a thought throughout the execution from the packaging to the utilizing the fragrance. The fragrance itself with a couple spritz and the wearer will be smelling like a million bucks for hours from AM to PM. The fragrance does change a little throughout the day it starts off with the floral flirtiness of Jasmine with Sakura Blossoms then into the fruity mixture of plum and vanilla and then finally the woody base. One can go all day wearing it without realizing it until you are complimented on the great smell in the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Greetings, My name is Tae'Kerrian. I am what you would consider a well rounded young female, Last month I had the opportunity to experience Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum for the 1st time. Upon receiving it the thing that caught my eye was the simplicity of the packaging.  The packaging was not elaborate but the smell that was eluding through it was mind blowing. The scent was strong but subtle. There was a floral scent with a hint of vanilla. Instantly my mind went back to my childhood. It reminded me of my granny  who after cooking my favorite vanilla pound cake would go to the flower bed and pick some of her favorite flowers to display on the table beside the yet still warm pound cake. Wow the fragrance that came from the mix of those two scents came together like a vivid sensual vision. Once I applied the Parfum my senses began to tingle and the days of old once again returned with the happy memories of my youth.  Once I began to look over the bottle I noticed that the parfum was vegan. For the last 5 years I have used and consumed only products that were vegan, meaning no meat or animals. To be able to actually have a scent that was not derived from an animal or any of it‚Äôs body parts made it even more special to me. For the company to make such an awesome smelling product without the use of animal by products was an achievement for me. I was already hooked by the scent but to learn that no animals were harmed with the making of this gracious product. I was simply amazed. I grew up on a farm where we often had animals of all kinds so having no animals harmed means a lot to me.  I am so grateful that the makers of this scent thought of making something that was clean and great smelling for consumers like me. The scent does not fade as the day goes on. I have put this on and not had to retouch it all day.

reviews.review_text: This scent is the new ‚Äúit girl‚Äù night scent. I am so obsessed with the sexiness this scent brings. I spray two sprays onto myself and it will last all night. Perfect for summer nights in the city.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie perfume No.14 - Icila is one of the most absolutely delightful fragrances I have ever smelled in my life. Each of its notes blend perfectly together to create an intoxicating scent that is feminine and fresh. The ruby pamplemousse and mandarin leaf top notes provide a bright citrusy opening, while the jasmine gives a soft and floral touch. The mid notes of Bulgarian rose, dark plum, and osmanthus give a fruity depth to the perfume that is simply satisfying. The base notes of patchouli, vanilla flower, and Sakura blossom, give an earthy, warm and sweet finish to this scent. Icila is a perfectly balanced fragrance that can be worn in any season and at any time of day. The staying-power of this perfume is incredible as well. I applied it to my pulse points in the morning and could still smell it on myself the next day. Maison Louis Marie has created the perfect perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie Perfume offers a delightful and subtle fragrance, perfect for those who appreciate a refined scent. Its restrained aroma ensures it isn't overwhelming, making it suitable for various occasions.  I feel that when I am with family or friends, people notice the smell but they really enjoy it and it's not overwhelming to them.  It makes my confidence level go so high.  The brand's commitment to ethical practices is commendable, as it proudly avoids animal testing. Additionally, it uses eco-friendly ingredients, ensuring its production is kind to the environment. This thoughtful approach enhances the appeal, making it a responsible choice for conscious consumers seeking elegance and sustainability in their perfume selection.  I recommend this product to anyone that wants a perfume with a great, yet restrained smell and cares about where their product comes from.

reviews.review_title: A Timeless Elegance in a Bottle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.14 - Icila Eau de Parfum has quickly ascended to the top of my fragrance collection, and for good reason. As an experienced cosmetologist with a keen nose for high-quality scents, I am absolutely captivated by this lovely floral masterpiece.  From the moment I first spritzed No.14 - Icila, I was enchanted by its perfectly balanced composition. The top notes of ruby pamplemousse, mandarin leaf, and jasmine provide a vibrant and refreshing introduction. These initial notes are light and uplifting, setting a joyful tone without being overwhelming.  As the fragrance develops, the mid notes of Bulgarian rose, dark plum, and osmanthus reveal themselves, adding depth and sophistication. The Bulgarian rose is particularly notable, lending a timeless elegance that harmonizes beautifully with the sweet richness of dark plum and the delicate charm of osmanthus.  The base notes are where Icila truly shines and demonstrates its staying power. Patchouli, vanilla flower, and sakura blossom create a warm, comforting foundation that lingers pleasantly on the skin. The patchouli adds a subtle earthiness, while the vanilla flower brings a soft sweetness, and the sakura blossom imparts a unique floral twist that ties everything together perfectly.  What I love most about Maison Louis Marie No.14 - Icila is its versatility. It is light enough for daily wear, ensuring I feel fresh and confident all day long, yet it carries enough presence to make a statement for evening occasions. It strikes that perfect balance ‚Äì neither too heavy nor too light.  In my professional opinion, this parfum is a true gem, suitable for any woman who appreciates a refined and exquisite floral scent. Maison Louis Marie has crafted a fragrance that is not only a joy to wear but also an experience to cherish. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is reminiscent of inhaling deeply on a beach with the sunsetting and salty waves murmuring; the warmth, the melding together of gourmand, warm sweet vanilla bean, and champagne with low, soft florals indeed carries one away into a state of ease, adventure, and wanderlust  When I sprayed the No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum on my skin, the initial scent was strongly a deep, warm fruity dark plum with tart notes (nearly citrus, but not as pointed and strong); there was a light vintage champagne undertone that dried down to warm vanilla musk and old English rose, with strong florals and more subtle dark plum notes.   The perfume itself is like a spritz of silk; it is light, gentle and lays on the skin like veil. it is not oily, nor is it drying to the skin. It leaves no sheen, and blends effortlessly with a mild smelling lotion. The No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum lasted for more than eight hours and into midnight without the need for reapplication; only one spritz delivered perfect distribution and intensity of perfume.   My impression of the No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is that it is one of the most unique, long-lasting and imaginative perfumes I have ever tried. I highly recommend the No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum for all occasions and for perfume connoisseurs seeking a new, unique perfume to add to their collection.

reviews.review_title: Fall in love with the first spritz

reviews.review_text: A good fragrance captures your senses is what I believe. It also boosts your confidence. Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau De Parfum is here to do that - capture senses and boosts confidence. This warm floral fragrance with key notes of jasmine, bulgarian rose and vanilla flower hits you at the right spots. The first spritz feels strong fresh scent which settles into the delicate vanilla. The fragrance is not too overwhelming or strong but is subtle and noticeable. It lasted around 4 to 5 hours on the skin and almost an entire day on my clothes. The design of the bottle is minimal but premium and looks luxurious. It‚Äôs easy to fall in love with this perfume and make it your go to for everyday. It is perfect for this spring time and I totally recommend it to anyone who loves floral fragrances blending with vanilla. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand.  Vanilla is the main base note.  I am usually not a big fan of vanilla scents.  However, this fragrance impressed me.     The scent is charming and inviting.  It has a nice elevated sophistication that stands out from other fragrances that I have experienced.  It has a variety of botanical scents.  The blend is somewhat complex, but I find it works beautifully together, almost like in harmony.    To describe it, the scent feels like I've stepped into a blooming garden of botanicals.  Each botanical scent is equally strong in presence.  The scent performs a beautiful dance to my sense of smell.  It makes me pause and indulge in its presence.    It has a warm and inviting feeling.  I think the floral vanilla creates that balance of invite.  It would say this is a perfect fall and winter fragrance that sends forth coziness and warmness.    I find each layer of the top, mid, and base notes creates a splendor of admiration and curiosity.  Complex in some way because of all the different botanicals involved such as patchouli, rose, jasmine, to name a few, but the complexities truly have impressed me.    I am enjoying the complexities and the charm of this fragrance.  A little spritz can go a long way.  The scent lasts for hours.    The packaging is simply gorgeous.  I love an aesthetic glass bottle. The pump spray dispenses a nice fine mist.    Overall, a beautiful product.  If you are trying this for the first time,  I think you'll be pleasantly surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is as versatile for occasions as it is complex and multi-layered in its scent profile. If you are wary of florals, this one is modern with a spicy and sophisticated sweet layer that keeps it from being cloying or old fashioned. A similar scent I would liken this one to is Viktor and Rolf flowerbomb, with the main difference being that this is a someone lighter scent. I appreciate scents that can fit perfect in a multitude of social circumstances - this is sophisticated enough for any work environment, as well as perfect for a date night. Especially as it wears, it smells lighter and fresher, so seasonally I can see certain notes making it versatile enough to be worn throughout the year. This is a fresh, modern scent and everything from the packaging to the notes reflects that fresh modern take on perfumes that sets it apart from similar scent profiles in the floral/woody realm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. This fragrance is absolutely stunning. I can see women in their late twenties and up wearing this. The more it dries down, the more I pick up on the rose note, and I absolutely love rose in a fragrance. This fragrance gave me about 4 hours of lasting power and projection, so it has moderate performance. I can see myself wearing this whenever I want to exude elegance. This is safe for office wear as well. It is not offensive and it will not choke anyone around you out. I noticed the base has patchouli, and if you‚Äôre anything like me and hate patchouli, you have nothing to worry about. I don‚Äôt pick up on the earthy note of patchouli at all. As an alcohol-based EDP, I found that it had very good lasting power because I was still able to smell it 8+ hours after applying it. Overall, I really liked this EDP, and I would recommend it to anyone who likes floral and citrus scents with a lot of depth. No.14 Icila by Maison Louis Marie is a stunning compilation of scents that remind us to live in the here but to also hold onto those memories. For me the scent is long wearing, up to five hours without reapplication. The notes I capture most frequently are ruby Pamplemousse, vanilla, and hints of those sultry, sexy deep woods. The vanilla is not a sweet type of vanilla as one might find in a gourmand perfume but rather a deeply seductive vanilla. If one dislikes vanilla, however, I would avoid this scent.  I love this scent. I reach for it often and I imagine myself, sitting outside of a beautiful little French cafe as spring has started. I have my cup of tea and a book. The weather is beautiful. Not too hot, not too cold. A bit of a breeze carries the scent of blooming flowers from a nearby park on its travels. People are walking by. Birds are singing. There is a fountain nearby and I can hear the water as it flows gently. The sky is a perfect shade of blue. It is the perfect day and it is all accompanied by this warm and luxurious scent. And I am indeed living in the now in that day because there is no phone, no rush it is pure bliss. I am happy. It is my happy place.   This is an extraordinary scent suited for anyone and is planet-friendly.   Review collected as part of a gifted collaboration with the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves natural, complex fragrances, I was really excited to try Maison Louis Marie's No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum. And I have to say, this fragrance has quickly become one of my new favorites.  The scent profile is described as floral, green, and herbal, and that's a pretty accurate assessment. The opening notes feature a refreshing blend of bergamot, galbanum, and pink pepper that instantly grab your attention. It has a real just stepped into a lush, botanical garden vibe.  As the fragrance develops, the beautiful floral heart notes of jasmine, lily of the valley, and white tea emerge. These provide a delicate, feminine touch that's not overpowering at all. And the base of amber, patchouli, and vetiver lend a wonderful warm, earthy foundation that grounds the scent.  What I really love about Icila is its versatility. It works beautifully for both daytime and evening wear. In the daytime, the fresh, invigorating top notes shine, while at night the deeper, more sensual base notes come through more prominently.  However, my only issue was with its longevity - I felt like I could only get 3-4 hours of wear time. And the sillage (how much the fragrance projects) is a but too light for my taste.  If you're a fan of natural, complex fragrances with a beautiful floral heart, I highly recommend trying Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila. It's a true work of olfactory art.

reviews.review_title: Such an emotional experience, beautifully captured

This bright warm floral is so intoxicating, I instantly get hit with a wall of jasmine. It‚Äôs so uplifting. I‚Äôm usually not a fan of Rose but for some reason, when it‚Äôs Bulgarian Rose I don‚Äôt get any ‚Äúsoapy‚Äù notes.   The glow of sultry woods really makes the vanilla vibe stand out. It‚Äôs not a sweet vanilla, it‚Äôs perfectly warm. I like to say ‚Äúadult vanilla‚Äù lol. I can see myself not only using this fragrance until it‚Äôs gone, but purchasing for myself. I love waking up from a great nights sleep to this scent on my sheets! It‚Äôs an instant pick me up! The dry down on my skin lasts for hours which is another HUGE bonus! This will definitely be my signature scent exclusively lol.   I love clean ingredients! Maison Louis Marie uses sustainable ingredients, a mission statement that I agree with and I do truly believe that we are not guaranteed anything in life and this scent is a reminder that life is beautiful, just like this scent!   Definitely recommend, even for those who are not usually drawn to florals

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: So many good memories when I wear this

This is such a beautiful and interesting scent. When you enter the room the scent lingers and it makes people ask you what you‚Äôre wearing or telling you how good you smell . This is a beautiful and intoxicating in a good way scent . This has a very citrus orangey and flowery scent that‚Äôs not overpowering but also lasting so perfect in many ways . I have worn this several times and to many different types of events including date night , out to dinner with friends and to my job . So many people have asked what I‚Äôm wearing . This citrus and floral fragrance can be worn at many different times during the year and for many occasion . It‚Äôs familiar but unlike any of my other scent. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

This beautiful perfume reminds you to both literally and figuratively take time out of your day to stop and smell the flowers and enjoy all the little moments. If you are a floral or gourmand fan and want the perfect spring/summer scent, this will be heavy in your rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love trying new fragrances. I love rose and this perfume has Bulgarian Roses, so I wanted to try this. I am so excited to try the new No.14 - Icila by Maison Louis Marie. From first look of packaging -it looks very elegant and classy with minimal design. Love that the notes are clearly printed on the top of the box  which I found really useful. Inside it has cutout setting where bottle is kept. It looks beautiful as you open . However in my case it was not the case. Upon opening the packaging I found  the lid was open, lying in a corner and bottle was under the cutout, so not a pleasant experience for me. So definitely brand need to do more work to secure the bottle so that it does not slip under the cutout packaging and  it reaches the customer as the brand planned  it and customers get to enjoys the beauty of packaging. The bottle design is also simple, classic and looks elegant.   This perfume smells gorgeous. I love the scent. Here are notes of perfume  Top - Ruby Pamplemousse, Mandarin Leaf, Jasmine  Mid - Bulgarian Rose, Dark Plum, Osmanthus  Base - Patchouli, Vanilla Flower, Sakura Blossom.  I can definitely smell roses in it. The notes are blended beautifully.  It smell so fresh and seductive. It is not a strong scent but a light one which diminishes with times. When I wore it, everyone around me liked the fragrance and I did get some compliments too.   For me it only last upto 4 hours and I tried few times as more or less the timing are same. After 3-4 hours it faded away quickly and that is the only down side for me. But overall I am very happy with this perfume as what matters more for me is the fragrance and it loved it and people around me also enjoyed it. It is a great find for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a licensed cosmetologist specializing in skincare and professional makeup artistry for over 25 years. Recently, I had the chance to try  No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum, and I was very impressed.  The fragrance has a complex blend of floral and woody notes that create a rich and interesting scent. The top notes are fresh and floral, which then transition to warmer, richer middle notes. The base notes are subtly woody, providing a strong foundation that gives the fragrance its sophisticated and versatile character.  One of the best things about No. 14 Icila is how long it lasts. The scent stays on your skin for hours, making it perfect for all-day wear. Whether you're at a special event or just going through your daily routine, this fragrance will keep its lovely smell without needing to be reapplied often.  I would describe No. 14 Icila as elegant and refined. It has a timeless charm that is great for those who love classic fragrances with a modern touch. The scent feels luxurious and uplifting, giving me an instant mood boost when I wear it. I especially appreciated that it is noticeable without being too strong, and it leaves a clean, sophisticated scent as it fades.  In summary,  No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is a remarkable fragrance that combines long-lasting power with a rich, elegant scent. It is a great choice for anyone looking for a classic, timeless perfume that can be worn confidently in any situation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 14, Icila delivers an uplifting and invigorating fragrance experience that perfectly captures the essence of spring. The initial burst of Rabi Pamplemousse and Mandarin Leaf introduces a fresh, citrusy vibrance that instantly boosts the mood, evoking the sensation of a sunny morning. Jasmine adds a touch of delicate floral sweetness, enhancing the lightness and brightness of the opening notes.  As the fragrance evolves, the heart notes of Bulgarian Rose, Dark Plum, and Osmanthus maintain the fresh and fruity character, while adding a richer, more complex floral depth. The rose offers a classic, timeless floral aroma, the dark plum brings a juicy, sweet note, and osmanthus infuses a subtle hint of apricot-like sweetness.  The base notes of Patchouli, Vanilla Flower, and Sakura Blossom anchor the scent with a warm, yet fresh finish. Patchouli adds a grounding earthiness, while the Vanilla Flower introduces a soft creaminess, and Sakura Blossom imparts a delicate, airy floral touch reminiscent of blooming cherry trees. This combination evokes the quintessential springtime atmosphere, where everything feels renewed and vibrant.  Overall, Icila is a mood-enhancing fragrance that conjures images of blossoming gardens and fresh spring breezes. It‚Äôs perfect for those seeking a scent that is both refreshing and invigorating, making you feel rejuvenated and optimistic, just like a beautiful spring day. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A truly timeless floral with fresh nuances

It is more than a perfume; it‚Äôs an everyday luxury that enhances my mood and environment with just a spritz. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: A warm youthful floral scent for ‚Äúhere and now‚Äù
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What a warm, youthful scent for the summer! I absolutely love this new scent from Maison Louis Marie.  With its name derived from a combination of the French words ‚ÄúIci ‚Äì Here‚Äù and ‚Äúla- there‚Äù, No. 14 Icila is a fragrance that helps you realize every fleeting second is sacred, and that time should never be taken for granted.  Icila helps you appreciate where you are ‚Äì right here, and right now.  Whether you are window shopping on the Champs-Elys√©es in Paris or enjoying a quick respite from the hustle and bustle on the Spanish Steps in Rome, Icila will help you remember to savor each and every moment.  A warm floral scent that melts into a creamy vanilla base will have you loving every moment you are wearing this scent.  With notes of Jasmine, plum and vanilla, let Icila help you learn to cherish every moment of the here and now.  Clean, cruelty-free and planet friendly, what‚Äôs not to love about this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie for about a week now, and it's quickly become a favorite in my fragrance collection. The scent opens with a refreshing burst of ruby pamplemousse and Mandarin leaf, which gives it an invigorating start that's perfect for any time of the day. The jasmine adds a lovely floral touch without being overpowering.  What I love most about No. 14 Icila is the base. The blend of warm, sultry woods and sweet floral blossoms creates a lasting impression that is both sophisticated and inviting. It‚Äôs not strong or overpowering, making it suitable for both day and night wear, and I often find myself receiving compliments even hours after application.  The perfume has a wonderful longevity; it lasts all day on my skin without needing to reapply, and it maintains its complexity and depth throughout. It truly evolves beautifully over time, revealing different layers of the scent profile as the day goes on.  Overall, No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum is a scent that is crafted and captures the essence of warm florals with an elegant twist. It feels timeless and modern at the same time, making it a great addition to any fragrance wardrobe. If you're looking for a perfume that is both unique and sophisticated, I highly recommend giving this one a try. Maison Louis Marie has created a truly stunning scent with No. 14 Icila. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this perfume! It has an incredible scent, perfect for the coming summer. The blend of mandarin leaves, jasmine, sakura blossom, and dark plum creates a truly captivating fragrance. The dark plum, in particular, stands out beautifully.   What's remarkable about this perfume is its vanilla note. While many shy away from vanilla for being overly sweet, this one is different. The vanilla here is light and subtle, perfectly balanced to complement the fresh, floral aroma. It's not overly sweet, making it an ideal choice for those who prefer a more refined scent.  This perfume is deliciously fresh and floral, absolutely perfect for summer. I can't get enough of it! It's neither too sweet nor too floral; it's just right. The dark plum note really shines, adding a unique touch that I love. It's versatile enough for any occasion, and even as a heavy sprayer, I find it never overwhelms.  The patchouli is present but not overpowering, which is great. This perfume smells fantastic straight from the bottle, but once you spray it on, it transforms into an even more delightful scent. It‚Äôs one of those fragrances that evolves beautifully on your skin throughout the day.  Longevity is another plus‚Äîthis perfume lasts all day. Even as it wears down, the hint of vanilla becomes noticeable, but it's a sophisticated, not-too-sweet vanilla.   I can't praise this perfume enough. It‚Äôs definitely a 5 out of 5 stars for me!

I haven‚Äôt been this excited about perfume in a long time. The first time I smelled No 14 Icila, I was a gonner. This is such a delicate and airy perfume that perfectly captures the essence of being here in the moment. It‚Äôs that fragile instant that is here now and gone in a split second. Icila is a beautiful airy sweet floral scent. It has so much going on, but it is very well blended and comes out smooth and light. The scent is effervescent where you get that airy, light quality, but without sharp fizziness. The moment I spray it, I almost feel like it has some aquatic quality, but not exactly salty sea water. Icila reminds me of breeze blowing over plain water and giving that very fresh note. The next thing that hits me is a delicate sweetness mixed with flowers. I love the note of ruby pamplemousse and the juiciness it gives. I also smell plum and vanilla. I can‚Äôt specifically name the flowers I smell, but it‚Äôs a mix of white and pink flowers, almost more like just a touch of petals dipped in vanilla (not a rich floral note). This is a perfect inoffensive fragrance for spring and summer. I can see myself wearing it both on the cooler and hotter days. Icila is such a beautiful blend of scents and it is so addicting. Whenever I wear it, I cannot stop smelling myself. I am quite picky with perfumes, and especially when it comes to floral notes, but this one was love at first sniff. It is such a ‚Äúme‚Äù scent and it quickly became one of my top perfumes.

reviews.review_title: Definitely a line I will explore more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been mesmerized, hypnotized and utterly fascinated by scents since my early teens/tweens. In my 40's now but this deep-rooted passion has been something I could find solace in throughout all these years. I have over 80 scents in my collection and I'm always on the hunt for more. Be it niche, designer or indie, I must sniff them all.    As a fan of the house of Maison Louis Marie, I was super excited to try their newest releases, N¬∞14 Icila Eau de Parfum. Sleek box, aesthetic clear glass bottle (in line with MLM's minimalistic packaging) and a super fine mister are all part of the fragrance experience and was I in for a treat?   The way we as individuals perceive fragrances will vary from one person to the next, therefore my experience may not mirror yours.   Icila opens with a fresh burst of grapefruit juice and green lushness of crushed citrus leaves. It awakens my senses with this slight bitterness that quickly leads me to the heart of dark, dark plum and Bulgarian Rose. She's dark, mysterious, dare I say vintage? The rose doesn't turn jammy or jam-like despite the presence of plum. The base notes of vanilla flower and Sakura simply don't come through for me - might just be my body chemistry, however the presence of patchouli is undeniable and will sure turn heads.    Icila has a wild beast projection for the first 3 hours and afterwards she slowly fades into the background becoming a skin-scent. I think this can be remedied by spraying on clothes (big plus it's a clear liquid so won't stain fabric) or hair. Could be layered with an oil-based moisturizer also for better longevity.    N¬∞14 took me by surprise: it's not a scent I anticipated from MLM.  Wouldn't consider it a safe blind purchase however, it's certainly more suited for more mature audiences - in my humble opinion. It's not your modern fruitchouli salad - definitely a unique, easily identifiable scent for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time ever trying Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum. My first impression of the Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum is a fresh, modern, purely elegant, sophisticated, beautiful fresh floral fragrance that is truly intoxicating! This perfume has warm beautiful floral notes of Jasmine, Bulgarian Rose, Vanilla Flower. There are some top notes of ruby pamplemousse and Mandarin leaf. It also smelled like a fresh slight musk to it sort of like a hint of light baby powder. If you love a perfume that is mostly all floral notes you will love this perfume!  The perfume is not super strong because it is a natural based perfume not made with strong chemicals or often toxic ingredients but it did last most of the day but then the fragrance gently faded. I still prefer a more natural based perfume then a perfume made with toxic harsh ingredients!  The packaging and perfume bottle was stunningly sleek, elegant, beautiful but simple! The Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum came in a beautiful thin box and the perfume bottle is gorgeous!  I love this perfume because it smells like a top notch very high end designer perfume or from a high end fragrance boutique while being a perfume that is better for your health! The brand Maison Louis Marie is also dedicated to not harming the environment with sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency! Overall, the Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum is a must have perfume to add to your perfume collection to elevate your collection!

However, compared the scent's opening, the dry down was a game-changer that makes me enjoy the perfume. The floral notes gradually subsided, allowing the richness of the plum and vanilla to emerge and meld harmoniously. At this phase, the scent was more floral and fruity with a faint citrus powdery undertone. It‚Äôs fresh, it‚Äôs sweet, it‚Äôs classy and can be used all year round. I think it‚Äôs a great daily scent. The packaging is simple and minimalistic, which is what I like about Maison Louis Marie overall. On the other hand, I would like to see a longer lifespan as a computer. In my case it lasted for almost 2-3 hours and then disappeared. Must be reapplied throughout the day. And, This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Icila by Maison Louis Marie is an elevated, seductive fragrance. The top notes of Jasmine, ruby pamplemousse, and mandarin leaf provides a lush, floral opening to the scent. This leads to the hearty middle notes of Bulgarian rose, dark plum, and osmanthus, which provide depth and body. The alluring base of patchouli, vanilla flower, and Sakura blossom leaves a dazzling scent trail that follows for hours. Typically, clean fragrances can fade quite fast on my skin, but Icila has phenomenal lasting power and silage. The fragrance itself is incredibly nostalgic for me, it reminds me of childhood afternoons spending time with my French family members outside in their garden. Maison Louis Marie is a phenomenal fragrance house and this scent is an excellent addition for their lineup; Icila is a sweeter floral scent that still matches up with their ethos and style. Icila is a dynamic, sparkling, effervescent fragrance that I am so grateful to have in my collection!

I wear it daily during my long ER shifts, and it lasts the entire 8+ hours. Its top notes include ruby pamplemouse, jasmine, and mandarin, followed by middle notes of Bulgarian rose and dark plum, settling into warm vanilla, patchouli, and sakura blossom. It creates a cosy and comforting feeling, perfect for summer when paired with a vanilla body cream. I layer it with Bath and Body Works' Simply Unwind sandalwood and vanilla scent, applying it to my wrists, elbows, and neck. I've also paired it with MLM No. 4 Bois de Balincourt and received many compliments. Overall, it's become an essential part of my daily routine. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will admit that I am one of those types of people who can never leave the house without brows, lashes, earrings and a spritz of something. Fragrance is such an important accessory and can set the mood for the day. As an esthetician who has been practicing for over a decade, I am very mindful of what kind of fragrances that I wear when in the treatment room, and my go tos are usually fresh, subtle and rooted in nature.   Maison Louis Marie's No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum immediately starts out as a fresh and effervescent scent that reminds me of a warm and sunny spring day. I love the initial presentation of this fragrance which contains the top notes of ruby pamplemousse (grapefruit), and mandarin leaf to invoke a touch of playfulness, while jasmine creates a bit of floral to help round out the fragrance.   The presence of Bulgarian rose, dark plum and osmanthus add a surprising depth to this fragrance by lending a woodsy aroma. As this fragrance wears, the vanilla flower, sakura blossom and patchouli grounds this fragrance to create longevity and further compliments the citrus and floral aspects of this formulation. This fragrance smells like it is heavily rooted in nature, and although it has patchouli as a base note, it doesn't come off as overly heavy or stifling.     In my opinion, I think that this is a sophisticated, and sparkling fragrance that doesn't smell synthetic. If you are a person who leans towards floral and citrus with a sight nod to woodsy scents that are rooted in nature, then this is a perfect fragrance for you.   *This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Love This Fragrance, it's an Experience!!

Totally different from my usual scents, however it drew me in and gave me a feeling of comfort. I love the fact it is genderless and adjusts to each individual for there own experience. reviews.review_text: I truly love fragrance and was very excited for my first whiff of No.14 - Icila by Maison Louis Marie. My first impression of this Eau de Parfum was one of elegance. The simplicity of the off white packaging in itself is lovely, clean, and well thought out while the presentation of the perfume itself is equally as appealing in it simplicity and elegance, though my bottle did arrive with a small smudge on the label.   With top notes of ruby pamplemousse, mandarin leaf, and jasmine, mid notes of bulgarian rose, dark plum, and osmanthus, with a base of patchouli, vanilla flower, and sakura blossom, Icila is truly a lovely scent. The scent itself comes off as rather floral but is not overpowering. The initial spray is somewhat strong but not overly so and the scent seems to become more delicate on the skin as the day wears on and it is indeed a lingering scent, I can still smell more than a hint of it on my skin late in the evening. However, although I very much enjoy this perfume, I do wish that I was able to detect more notes of the pamplemousse and the plum, it does come across just a bit too floral for my personal taste. I would though, very much recommend this scent as it is very tasteful and elegant.

When choosing a perfume I also check the ingredients and make sure there is nothing harmful to the skin or body since you will be wearing and smell it whole day. This new Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is so clean and luxurious. The packaging is classic and elegant. There is nothing woody in this perfume and all I smell is flowers and fruity. It‚Äôs not sweet but on a warm and deep side. Initially the plum scent dominated the whole notes and a few moments later I smell a faint powdery Sakura blossom. The jasmine came the last and stays until the end. It smells familiar but unique and it is on the feminine side to me. If you don‚Äôt like woody note in fragrance you have to try this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lately I have really gotten into fragrances and love to try new ones because i am rapidly growing my collection. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I like gourmand scents I‚Äôve been trying to find something more mature and elegant. The Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila is exactly the scent I was looking for! The Icila Eau de Parfum smells classy and rich. It is perfect for those who want a fragrance that smells delicious and that won‚Äôt give you a migraine or irritate your sinuses. It‚Äôs a fine even mist and works well with my body chemistry. When I wear it, I pick up on mainly the floral notes like the Jasmine but it has that dark plum to elevate it and give it more depth. It is a very sophisticated scent without smelling like your grandmas perfume collection. It lasted all day on me and I wore it to a Mother‚Äôs Day brunch and received tons of compliments! It was the perfect scent to wear for this occasion and put me in such a good mood everytime I got a whiff of it! This is my go to spring scent! The No.14 Icila comes in a glass bottle and the design is simple and clean but yet so aesthically pleasing. The notes are included on the outside of the product box, so you know what notes are in this specific fragrance. Maison Louis Marie focuses on quality ingredients that do not harm you or the planet, which makes me praise this brand and their fragrances even more! The Icila fragrance was inspired by the French word ici‚Äù which means here and conveys to us that we should enjoy being here in the moment. This holds true as time is precious and I had a fantastic time enjoying the fragrance while spending time with loved ones. I often relate certain scents with memories and I can see myself creating many more memories while wearing No.14 Icila!

reviews.review_text: As a licensed cosmetologist, working in the world of all things beauty for 28 years, I have been surrounded by fragrance most of my life! The No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is a warm and inviting fragrance that draws me in and makes me feel comfort and warmth from the vanilla, but also is playful and seductive feeling from the sweet floral notes of jasmine, rose and plum. Thank you for that! I‚Äôm excited to try others by this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: A Warm Embrace of Floral and Woody Delights
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum is an amazing fragrance that captures the essence of a warm, inviting embrace. Upon first spritz, Icila envelops you in a cloud of warm, inviting florals. The ruby pamplemousse and mandarin leaf provide a refreshing citrusy opening, while the jasmine adds a touch of delicate sweetness. Icila has impressive longevity, lasting for several hours on my skin. The sillage is moderate, creating a subtle aura of fragrance that lingers in the air. It's a scent that exudes confidence and sophistication without being overpowering. I find it particularly suitable for evening wear, as it has a touch of sensuality and mystery that makes it perfect for special occasions. The fragrance is packaged in a beautiful, minimalist bottle that reflects the brand's aesthetic. It has quickly become one of my favorites. The blend of florals, fruits, and woods is truly exquisite, creating a scent that is both comforting and alluring. If you're looking for a warm, inviting fragrance that will make you feel confident and beautiful, I highly recommend giving Icila a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an aficionado of fragrances with around 80 bottles in my collection, discovering Maison Louis Marie's No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum was a delightful revelation. This scent is truly multifaceted, unveiling its entire olfactory pyramid hour by hour, never failing to surprise and captivate with its allure and sensuality. It effortlessly stands out in my collection, showcasing what I consider French quality perfume at its finest. Its longevity and richness are remarkable; just a few sprays linger enchantingly until the next day, enveloping you in a cloud of irresistible aroma. The packaging, though understated, exudes classic elegance and modesty with its transparent bottle‚Äîa testament to the treasure within. Priced affordably at under $100, this fragrance is a steal for such quality. Now, I eagerly anticipate exploring the other scents in Maison Louis Marie's collection, grateful to the perfumer for crafting such a masterpiece. I'm simply enamored with this scent.   *This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm excited to share my thoughts on the beautiful Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila perfume.  This scent is a warm and cozy blend of flowers, with notes of jasmine, rose, and vanilla. It's like a big hug in a bottle!  When you first spray it on, you'll notice a fresh and fruity smell from the pamplemousse and Mandarin leaf. Then, the heart of the scent kicks in with rich plum, vanilla, and cherry blossom notes. Finally, the base of warm woods leaves a soft, shimmering effect that makes you feel confident and beautiful.  What I love most about this perfume is how it makes me feel. It's like a ray of sunshine in a bottle - it's perfect for brightening up a dull day or adding a little extra something to a night out.  If you're looking for a new perfume that's feminine, sophisticated, and just plain lovely, give Maison Louis Marie No. 14 Icila a try. Trust me, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved skin care since I was young. It only made sense that I became an aesthetician. My passion for skin care overflowed into make up as well as supplemental. I couldn't love what I do any more and only wish to help more people through my knowledge and training of skin and makeup practices as well as my education on nutritional supplements. I am 36 with three kids and the signs of aging are creeping up faster than I would like! I love to try things to combat that while staying out of a doctors office. This perfume scent is gorgeous! It smells floral but clean. It isn‚Äôt as sweet as it is crisp and fresh. The mist is light with a fine particle spray. The bottle is lovely and looks like crystal on a vanity. The scent lasts all day and smells absolutely expensive. I receive so many compliments when I wear this. It‚Äôs a mature scent that I would recommend to 20 year olds and up. There isn‚Äôt any sugary sweetness so it has a very high end feel to it. I want a whole set of this scent with lotion, a candle and bath oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First let me say I love brands that have history behind them and Maison Luis Marie goes back to 1792. If you ever get a chance to dig in to the rich botanical history it is quite interesting. The family crest on the package is a very unique way of symbolizing this. Now let‚Äôs dig into this specific perfume, No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum.
